title: "Python Stock Market Analysis Dashboard"

## Project overview

This project is a **Python-based stock market analysis and visualization dashboard** designed to explore price trends, moving averages, and market behavior across different time periods.

The dashboard focuses on providing **interactive insights** into stock performance, making it easier to analyze trends and patterns commonly used in technical analysis.

---

## Key features

- Stock selection (e.g. AAPL, NVDA, TSLA)
- Adjustable time periods (1M, 3M, 6M, 1Y, 2Y)
- Simple Moving Average (SMA) overlay
- Identification of upward and downward price runs
- Interactive visual exploration of historical data
